attributes.action: put an end to the Daily Express constantly and persistently "front paging" Princess Diana
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has now been nearly 10 years since Princess Diana tragically passed away because of the harrassment of members of the press.  In death, as in life she is constantly appearing on the front page of the Daily Express (estimated 150+ times in 2006).  It is about time that the Daily Express and other media let this woman rest in peace.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
